Key Match Events: Germany's match against Denmark was suspended in the first half due to a thunderstorm, with the players being taken off the field before rain and hail started falling down at the Westfalenstadion.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was stopped for just over 15 minutes before the players returned to the pitch to finish the final 10 minutes of the first half.
Others: The match resumed at 35 minutes with the two sides equally poised, with the winner to face the winners of Spain and Georgia in the quarter-finals.
